knimeNode.name: ShuffleData
knimeNode.shortDescription: Shuffle data within columns of the input data matrix.

fullDescription.intro: All values within selected columns are shuffles
fullDescription.option: Seed for the initialization of the Random object. When using the same seed, the same result is guaranteed.
Only data of selected columns is shuffled (column-wise; the distribution within each column stay the same).

ports.outPort: output matrix with same table specs as input, but the selected columns contain shuffled values.
